mapper.select: select info.shopName, info.shopIntro, info.shopNum from (select shopNum from timeSchedule where (startTime between to_date(#{searchTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') and to_date(#{searchTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')+29/(24*60)) and arranged=1) time join (select shopNum,shopName,shopIntro from shopInfo where shopAddr LIKE '%'||#{shopAddr}||'%')info on time.shopNum=info.shopNum
